item.title: Words and sentences: names of colours
item.summary: Names for Colours, etc. Given by /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-7. 6601, 6606 and 6605 rev., 24. 8170). The names of different colours given by |han≠kass'o (possibly, Lucy Lloyd thinks later in 1897, in response to a painted card).
item.comments: 1) This story interrupts The story of Tssi-!kuara |hin (the Lioness and her adopted daughter), 2) p.8169v: (1 April 1879) a note on colours, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-24
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
